name: Erase Against Time
description:
A timed racing game where you run away from the artist that made you! Race to the end of the obstacle course by yourself or compete against your friends.

CREDITS

Lead Designer:
Aidan "Legandary Prinny" W. Crawford

Programming:
Sam "Rorazoro" Chancey
Ralph "Krycek" T. Moffat
